mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM sys_user u INNER JOIN sys_user_role r ON u.user_id = r.user_id

SELECT u.user_id as userId, u.username, u.nickname, u.status, u.online_status as onlineStatus, u.create_user_id as createUserId, u.create_time as createTime, u.update_time as updateTime, r.role_id as roleId FROM sys_user u INNER JOIN sys_user_role r ON u.user_id = r.user_id
order by u.user_id desc limit #{pageStart},#{limit}
